HOME_CONSTANTS.CAROUSEL_TEXT: Discover the secrets Cundinamarca has for you

TABS_CONSTANTS.SEARCH_BY_KEY_WORD: Search using key words or a category. Example: Restaurants, music, museums
TABS_CONSTANTS.SELECT_TOWN: Choose a municipality for your search
TABS_CONSTANTS.ROUTE_STARTING_POINT_TIP: You can choose a starting point or allow the app to use your current location as your starting point
TABS_CONSTANTS.ROUTE_DESTINATION_POINT_TIP: Pick the municipality you are heading to
TABS_CONSTANTS.MAKE_ROUTE: Show me this route on the map

HOW_IT_WORKS.TITLE: It's so easy! This is how it works:
HOW_IT_WORKS.DESCRIPTION_1: Cundinamarca has for you a lot of experiences and wonderful destinations
HOW_IT_WORKS.DESCRIPTION_2: De Tour por Cundinamarca helps you to search places according to your interests so you get the opportunity to explore the region
HOW_IT_WORKS.DESCRIPTION_3: Enjoy all the adventures waiting for you!

HOW_IT_WORKS_TRADER.PAGE_TITLE: This is how De Tour por Cundinamarca works:
HOW_IT_WORKS_TRADER.DESCRIPTION_1: Create a profile for your business; it is completely free!
HOW_IT_WORKS_TRADER.DESCRIPTION_2: Show your products and services on the Internet
HOW_IT_WORKS_TRADER.DESCRIPTION_3: Make your business visible to 48% of the national tourism

REGISTER_MUNICIPALITY_CONSTANTS.CREATE_ACCOUNT: Create an account for your town
REGISTER_MUNICIPALITY_CONSTANTS.NAME: Name of  your town
REGISTER_MUNICIPALITY_CONSTANTS.MUNICIPALITY_OPENINGHOURS_TEXT: Write your Citizen attention point opening hours. For example:
REGISTER_MUNICIPALITY_CONSTANTS.MUNICIPALITY_GET_USER_LOCATION_TIP: Use your current location to indicate on the map where the Citizen attention point is located
REGISTER_MUNICIPALITY_CONSTANTS.MUNICIPALITY_LOCATION_TIP: You can set a pin on the accurate location of  the Citizen attention point
REGISTER_MUNICIPALITY_CONSTANTS.UPLOAD_SECONDARY_PHOTOS_TIP: Upload photos of your town to help tourists get to know it
REGISTER_MUNICIPALITY_CONSTANTS.COMPLETE_MUNICIPALITY_REGISTRATION_TEXT: Thanks for registering your town.You can see what others will see when the admin gives you access to your account
REGISTER_MUNICIPALITY_CONSTANTS.COMPLETE_MUNICIPALITY_UPLOAD_TEXT: Your town information has been updated

REGISTER_SITE_CONSTANTS.UPLOAD_MAIN_PHOTO_TIP: Upload a Profile picture of your business
REGISTER_SITE_CONSTANTS.UPLOAD_SECONDARY_PHOTOS_TIP: Upload photos of your business to help your clients get to know your premises and your products
REGISTER_SITE_CONSTANTS.BUSINESS_FACADE_PHOTOS: Pictures of the facade of your business
REGISTER_SITE_CONSTANTS.BUSINESS_PRODUCTS_PHOTOS: Pictures of your Products and/or Services
REGISTER_SITE_CONSTANTS.BUSINESS_OPENINGHOURS_TEXT: Write your business opening hours. For example:
REGISTER_SITE_CONSTANTS.BUSINESS_OPENINGHOURS_TEXT_EXAMPLE: Mon - Friday, 8:00 AM to 6:00 PM. Sat, 10:00 AM to 5:00 PM
REGISTER_SITE_CONSTANTS.BUSINESS_GET_USER_LOCATION_TIP: Use your current location to indicate on the map that here is your business
REGISTER_SITE_CONSTANTS.BUSINESS_LOCATION_TIP: You can set a pin on the accurate location of your business on the map
REGISTER_SITE_CONSTANTS.CHOOSE_AUXILIAR_CATEGORY_TEXT: Select an additional category for your business
REGISTER_SITE_CONSTANTS.CHOOSE_OTHER_CATEGORY_TEXT: If your business has other activities you can add another 2 categories
REGISTER_SITE_CONSTANTS.CHOOSE_OTHER_CATEGORY_TEXT_SECOND: If your business has other activities you can add another category
REGISTER_SITE_CONSTANTS.CHOOSE_SUBCATEGORY_TEXT: Select one or more subcategories to specify your business activities
REGISTER_SITE_CONSTANTS.PHONE_VALIDATION: Required field, must be a minimum 7 and maximum 10 digits number
REGISTER_SITE_CONSTANTS.TAGS_TEXT: Enter a comma separated list of business tags to help your clients identify your business easily Example:
REGISTER_SITE_CONSTANTS.COMPLETE_UPDATE_TEXT: Your site information has been updated

LOGIN.PASSWORD_LENGTH: The password must be at least 6 characters long*

ACCOUNT_INFO.PASSWORDS_MUST_BE_EQUAL: The confirmation password must be the same as the password.*
ACCOUNT_INFO.OLD_AND_NEW_PASSWORDS_MUST_BE_DIFFERENT: New and confirm password must be the same*

ERROR_PLACE_OUTSIDE_CUNDINAMARCA: Cundinamarca locations outside are not allowed
ERROR_UNAVAILABLE_LOCATION: Lo sentimos, ahora mismo tu ubicación no está disponible
ERROR_YOU_SHOULD_FILL_YOUR_ROUTE_ORIGIN: You must choose your starting point
GET_SITES_ERROR: The search option is unavailable in this moment. Please reload the page
GET_TOWNS_ERROR: The towns list is unavailable in this moment. Please reload the page
NO_RESULTS: Sorry, there are no results for this search. Please try with different words.

INCORRECT_ACCOUNT_TYPE_TRADER: It looks like you have a trader account, please log in as a trader
TIMEOUT_CONNECTION_ERROR: The server is taking too long to respond, please check your internet connection or try again later

DOUBLE_LOGIN_ERROR: Please log out before login with another account
